text: Aroldo Casali (18 October 1925 - 10 February 2015) was a Sammarinese sports shooter. He competed in the 50 metre pistol event at the 1960 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Sammarinese male sport shooters Category:Italian male sport shooters Category:Italian people of Sammarinese descent Category:Olympic shooters of San Marino Category:Shooters at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:People from Forlì
title: Aroldo Casali
